title: Cosmopolis: A Novel - Don Delillo
description:
Don DeLillo - Cosmopolis: A Novel

PDF and epub

SCRIBNER (2003)

84 pages


It is an April day in the year 2000 and an era is about to end. The booming times of market optimismÃ¢â‚¬â€when the culture boiled with money and corporations seemed more vital and influential than governmentsÃ¢â‚¬â€ are poised to crash. Eric Packer, a billionaire asset manager at age twenty-eight, emerges from his penthouse triplex and settles into his lavishly customized white stretch limousine. 

Today he is a man with two missions: to pursue a cataclysmic bet against the yen and to get a haircut across town. Stalled in traffic by a presidential motorcade, a music idolÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s funeral and a violent political demonstration, Eric receives a string of visitorsÃ¢â‚¬â€experts on security, technology, currency, finance and a few sexual partnersÃ¢â‚¬â€as the limo sputters toward an increasingly uncertain future.

Cosmopolis, Don DeLilloÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s thirteenth novel, is both intimate and global, a vivid and moving account of the spectacular downfall of one man, and of an era.
